mapper.select: select address from stop_visit where (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, left_time, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))>5 and inJudge = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE stop_visit SET inJudge = 0 WHERE (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, left_time, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))>5 and inJudge = 1
mapper.delete: delete from stop_visit where beat < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
mapper.sql: stop_visit_id, address, inJudge, in_time, left_time, rt, visited_times, beat, handleJudge, mac, rssi, indoorname
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from stop_visit
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into stop_visit (address, inJudge, in_time, left_time, rt, visited_times, beat, handleJudge, mac, rssi, indoorname) values (#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injudge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{leftTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitedTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{handlejudge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rssi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{indoorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into stop_visit
address,
inJudge,
in_time,
left_time,
rt,
visited_times,
beat,
handleJudge,
mac,
rssi,
indoorname,

mapper.update:
update stop_visit
stop_visit_id = #{record.stopVisitId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inJudge = #{record.injudge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
in_time = #{record.inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
left_time = #{record.leftTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rt = #{record.rt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visited_times = #{record.visitedTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beat = #{record.beat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
handleJudge = #{record.handlejudge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mac = #{record.mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rssi = #{record.rssi,jdbcType=INTEGER},
indoorname = #{record.indoorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update stop_visit set stop_visit_id = #{record.stopVisitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inJudge = #{record.injudge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, in_time = #{record.inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, left_time = #{record.leftTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rt = #{record.rt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visited_times = #{record.visitedTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beat = #{record.beat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, handleJudge = #{record.handlejudge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mac = #{record.mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rssi = #{record.rssi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, indoorname = #{record.indoorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update stop_visit
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inJudge = #{injudge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
in_time = #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
left_time = #{leftTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rt = #{rt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visited_times = #{visitedTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beat = #{beat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
handleJudge = #{handlejudge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rssi = #{rssi,jdbcType=INTEGER},
indoorname = #{indoorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where stop_visit_id = #{stopVisitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update stop_visit set address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inJudge = #{injudge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, in_time = #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, left_time = #{leftTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rt = #{rt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visited_times = #{visitedTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beat = #{beat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, handleJudge = #{handlejudge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rssi = #{rssi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, indoorname = #{indoorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where stop_visit_id = #{stopVisitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
